name: A Traffic Jam!
description:
Traffic Jam! is a simple and addictive sliding car puzzle game that is entertaining for all ages!

The goal is to get the stuck car out of a traffic jam full of different vehicles by moving the other cars out of its way. Easy to play, but difficult to be a master. Solve interesting puzzles one by one and become the best traffic controller!

【Features】

- Hundreds of interesting levels!
- Fun and addictive gameplay
- Smooth and beautiful animation
- Colourful 3D graphics
- Extremely smooth touch control.

【How to play】

- Move the stuck car to the exit.
- Horizontal vehicles can move from side to side.
- Vertical vehicles can move up and down.

Traffic Jam! is an exciting free puzzle game you will want to tell your friends about. Try it right now and you will love this addictive puzzle game!
